nodes.text: Star Wars Origami 2: 34 More Projects from a Galaxy Far, Far Away....

Star Wars Origami 2: 34 More Projects from a Galaxy Far, Far Away.... is an origami art book based on the Star Wars sequel trilogy and the follow-up to Star Wars Origami: 36 Amazing Paper-folding Projects from a Galaxy Far, Far Away..... It was written by Chris Alexander and published by Workman Publishing on October 13, 2020.

A brand-new book of Star Wars Origami, following in the footsteps of the original bestseller. Here are all-new origami figures to fold, featuring characters, spaceships, and more from the recent Star Wars films (Episodes 7-9), including BB8, Rey, Finn, and much more.
